info.name: toroidal gears

renderpass.code:
// variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/7lKfzR

#define rot(a)     mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))                      // rotation 
#define R(a)       r.x-=1.2, r.xy*=rot(a), r.x+=1.2                  // out-of-axe rotation
#define d(r,n,s)   .04* sin( n *atan(r.z,r.x)+ 10.*iTime + s )       // dents
#define g(s)   t = min(t, max( length(r.yz)-.3 -d(r.yxz,12.,s), abs(r.x+.95) -.03 ) ) // satellite gear     

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9.,i,s;
    vec3  R = iResolution,
          D = normalize(vec3(U+U, -12.*R.y) - R),          // ray direction
          p = vec3(0,0,20), q, r,                          // marching point along ray 
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? iMouse.xyz/R -.5
              :  vec3( .15,.07,0) * cos(.3*iTime + vec3(0,11,0)); 
    p += sqrt(R.y/18.) * texelFetch(iChannel0,ivec2(U)%1024,0).x * D; // jitter against pseudo-shading banding
          
    for (O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.01) {         // march scene
        q = p,
        q.yz *= rot(-6.*M.y),                              // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(-6.*M.x-1.57); q.x += 1.; 
        for (t=9.,s=1.57,i=0.; i++ < 10.; s=-s ) 
            r = q, 
            R(.63*i),                                      // ring         
            t = min(t, max( max( length(r)-1., .9-length(r)) ,  abs(r.y) + d(r,32.,s) -.05 )),
            R(-.18), g(s), R(-.3), r.y = -r.y, g(-s);      // satellite gears       
 
        p += .5*t*D;                                       // step forward = dist to obj          
   }
   O *= O * 1.3;                                           // color scheme
}
